question: Question: When this technique is combined with paired-end tags, and high-throughput sequencing technology, a new technique with the wonderful name of ChIA-PET is obtained. [10] Identify this technique where proteins and DNA are bound, and precipitated with antibodies, which is used to determine association between proteins and sequences of DNA.
